title: [bug] panic is TextFormatter when Caller is nil
body:
Found myself with this stack:

```
panic(0x19f4ce0, 0x23e7190)
	/usr/local/Cellar/go/1.11.1/libexec/src/runtime/panic.go:513 +0x1b9
github.com/sirupsen/logrus.(*TextFormatter).Format(0xc0002ef540, 0xc000305440, 0xc0003059b0, 0x1, 0xc000305440, 0xc0000f97e0, 0x1073cab)
	/Users/shousper/go/src/github.com/sirupsen/logrus/text_formatter.go:177 +0xad7
github.com/sirupsen/logrus.(*Entry).write(0xc000305440)
	/Users/shousper/go/src/github.com/sirupsen/logrus/entry.go:232 +0x93
github.com/sirupsen/logrus.Entry.log(0xc000305980, 0xc0003225a0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, ...)
	/Users/shousper/go/src/github.com/sirupsen/logrus/entry.go:208 +0x194
github.com/sirupsen/logrus.(*Entry).Debug(0xc0003053e0, 0xc0000f9908, 0x1, 0x1)
	/Users/shousper/go/src/github.com/sirupsen/logrus/entry.go:251 +0xae
```

When using the `TextFormatter`. It looks like [this line](https://github.com/sirupsen/logrus/blob/master/text_formatter.go#L177) and maybe [this line](https://github.com/sirupsen/logrus/blob/master/text_formatter.go#L179) might need to check the `Caller` is present first? Perhaps using [HasCaller](https://github.com/sirupsen/logrus/blob/master/entry.go#L175)?

I'm not sure if some other code is checking this first, but definitely where I [found Caller to be set](https://github.com/sirupsen/logrus/blob/master/entry.go#L198) it can [return nil](https://github.com/sirupsen/logrus/blob/master/entry.go#L172) in some cases, but also that setter is conditional as well.

Not sure how you'd like this solved, so raising an issue first üëç
